name: Dish Away
description:
Dish Away: You are a ninja chef you just received a "plates for life" coupon. What could you possibly do with so many plates? Why, fight monsters and cook them up of course!

Monsters come in waves, and each drops its own unique ingredient, and you can do one of 3 different things with these:
1) Prepare them into a dish and then sell that dish for money (score).
2) Prepare them into a dish and eat it. Each dish gives a unique temporary buff, with the exception of the boss's dish, which gives a permanent buff.
3) Not prepare them and use them for unique special attacks.

Controls:
Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
Dash: Space
Throw Plates / Items: Left Click
Use Ability / Eat Food: Right Click
All buttons are configurable in the options menu
Mute music: M (non configurable)

~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~ . ~

Dish Away was made in 5 days for a project I had to submit. Since it was not made for a game jam, please be aware that many of the game's assets are not mine.

Assets that are downloaded: music, monster sprites, player sprites, ingredients, floor.
Assets that I made: icon, dishes, work stations.
Coding, Design, and Gameplay loop are made by me.
